类 Song

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow.Song
public class Song extends Object
Represents a song in the game, including its metadata (composer, illustration, chart data) and provides access to song details such as the song's name, composer, chart information, and offset. It also validates the song's charts and handles data related to different levels of difficulty.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    final double
    OFFSET
    Offset value for the song, used for timing adjustments in the game.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器

    Constructs a new song from the given directory path, reading its metadata and chart information.

  • 字段详细资料

    • OFFSET

      public final double OFFSET
      Offset value for the song, used for timing adjustments in the game.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Song

      public Song(String dir) throws RuntimeException
      Constructs a new song from the given directory path, reading its metadata and chart information. The constructor reads the song's credits and chart data from a text file. If the chart files are invalid, a RuntimeException will be thrown.
      参数:
      dir - The directory path to the song's resources.
      抛出:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error reading the song's credits or if the chart data is invalid.

  • 方法详细资料

    • hasLG

      public boolean hasLG()
      Returns whether the song has a "LG" (large) chart.
      返回:
      true if the song has a "LG" chart, false otherwise.

    • getComposer

      public String getComposer()
      Returns the composer of the song.
      返回:
      The composer of the song.

    • getIllustration

      public String getIllustration()
      Returns the illustration or artist associated with the song.
      返回:
      The illustration or artist name.

    • getCharterData

      public Pair<String,Double> getCharterData()
      Returns the data for the selected chart level. The level is determined by the current selection in the game.
      返回:
      A Pair containing the chart type and its corresponding value for the current level.

    • getCharterData

      public Pair<String,Double> getCharterData(String s)
      Returns the data for the specified chart level.
      参数:
      s - The name of the chart level (e.g., "BS", "MD", "AV", "LG").
      返回:
      A Pair containing the chart type and its corresponding value for the specified level.

    • getSongName

      public String getSongName()
      Returns the name of the song.
      返回:
      The name of the song.

    • getAbsoluteDir

      public String getAbsoluteDir()
      Returns the absolute directory path of the song's resources.
      返回:
      The absolute directory path.
